FuncDef: This command enables the context for a MRP policy. The mrp-policy specifies either a forward or a drop action for the Group BMAC attributes associated with the ISIDs specified in the match criteria. The mrp-policy can be applied to multiple BVPLS services as long as the scope of the policy is template.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the redirect policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, etc.), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
This keyword is required when first creating the configuration context. When the context is created, it is possible to navigate into the context without the create keyword.
